stoltz2019concept.title: Concept mover’s distance: Measuring concept engagement via word embeddings in texts
stoltz2019concept.author: Stoltz, Dustin S and Taylor, Marshall A
stoltz2019concept.typeNotRelevantText: The paper introduces the metric Concept Mover’s Distance, where a document is measured by the minimum distance the words in the document need to travel to arrive at the position of a “pseudo document” consisting of only words denoting a focal concept. Morality does not play a role at all in the paper, the authors just refers to George Lakoff’s theory about the morality of politics in the United States at the end of the paper.
